title: Unmatched brackets cause rustc stack overflown

labels.name: I-crash
labels.description: Issue: The compiler crashes (SIGSEGV, SIGABRT, etc). Use I-ICE instead when the compiler panics.

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code ```Rust fn main() { let a = include!(concat!(env!("CARGO_MANIFEST_DIR"), "/variable.txt")); } ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.49.0 (e1884a8e3 2020-12-29) binary: rustc commit-hash: e1884a8e3c3e813aada8254edfa120e85bf5ffca commit-date: 2020-12-29 host: x86_64-apple-darwin release: 1.49.0 ``` ### Error output ``` Compiling stackoverflown v0.1.0 (/Users/cheng/Developer/Rust/stackoverflown) thread 'rustc' has overflowed its stack fatal runtime error: stack overflow error: could not compile `stackoverflown` Caused by: process didn't exit successfully: `rustc --crate-name stackoverflown --edition=2018 src/main.rs --error-format=json --json=diagnostic-rendered-ansi --crate-type bin --emit=dep-info,link -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 -C metadata=804d05924b7ac9e0 --out-dir /Users/cheng/Developer/Rust/stackoverflown/target/debug/deps -C incremental=/Users/cheng/Developer/Rust/stackoverflown/target/debug/incremental -L dependency=/Users/cheng/Developer/Rust/stackoverflown/target/debug/deps` (signal: 6, SIGABRT: process abort signal) ```
Backtrace

``` Compiling stackoverflown v0.1.0 (/Users/cheng/Developer/Rust/stackoverflown) thread 'rustc' has overflowed its stack fatal runtime error: stack overflow error: could not compile `stackoverflown` Caused by: process didn't exit successfully: `rustc --crate-name stackoverflown --edition=2018 src/main.rs --error-format=json --json=diagnostic-rendered-ansi --crate-type bin --emit=dep-info,link -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 -C metadata=804d05924b7ac9e0 --out-dir /Users/cheng/Developer/Rust/stackoverflown/target/debug/deps -C incremental=/Users/cheng/Developer/Rust/stackoverflown/target/debug/incremental -L dependency=/Users/cheng/Developer/Rust/stackoverflown/target/debug/deps` (signal: 6, SIGABRT: process abort signal) ```

[variable.txt](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/files/5898401/variable.txt)
